scenariodescription: The robot is a delivery bot tasked with transporting a box from one point to another in a small warehouse. The robot starts from the north-east corner and must navigate to the south-west corner. As the robot takes a turn at a blind corner located at the intersection of nodes 'aa', '99', and '47', it immediately encounters a human. The human is initially unaware of the robot and continues to walk, only noticing the robot when it gets very close. Upon seeing the robot, the human stops completely until the robot is no longer blocking the way.

humanbehavior.Human 1: Human 1 is walking through the warehouse, unaware of the robot. When the robot turns the blind corner and gets very close, Human 1 stops completely until the robot moves out of the way.

expectedrobotbehavior: The robot must navigate carefully through the warehouse, transporting the box from point A (node 'c5') to point B (node '0e'). Upon encountering Human 1 at the blind corner, the robot should adjust its path to clear the way for Human 1 by saying 'EXCUSE ME' and waiting for the human to move. The robot then continues towards its destination once the path is clear.
